item.title: Upcoming event - stay tuned!
item.description: Discover more about STS-I at an upcoming talk hosted by the Humanities Center. This event will be recorded for your convenience, and weâ€™ll be sharing further details soon. Also, stay tuned for proposals related to the planned curriculum for a Science and Technology Studies minor at the University of San Diego!
